title: @Riot, ever heard of a champion called "Aatrox"?
body: Could you stop ignoring him please?

replies.body: Yea I've seen him on deep web
Yep, right next to the Red Room. Hard shit to find, almost got kidnapped a good 10 times looking for this "Aatrox" thing.
Aatrox is the new urgot.
No urgot is still urgot
what about {{champion:83}}
Reworked soon.
how can they rework something that does not exist?

Who's "Aatrox"?

Is he supposed to be some important character in the lore that's completely neglected in game and has a ridiculously unfitting kit?
idk what you are talking about, aside from his ult which isn't that bad Atrox is pretty OP mid to late game.

i think you might want to add a kappa

To be honest Aatrox is only good when uber-snowballed but even then there are champs that do that better in the top lane

Aatrox needs reworked, he's one of the few champions that both _deserves_ to be nerfed into the ground and was recognized as such by Riot. He snowballs too hard when he reaches draintank status, and he tower dives way too easily.
Basically, he got the old Poppy treatment. Extremely ridiculously strong if viable, so the only way to keep him in check is to make him garbage until they can afford to rework him completely.

> [{quoted}](name=Trollmanship,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QzhETsaN,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-08-10T18:19:32.344+0000)
>
> Aatrox needs reworked, he's one of the few champions that both _deserves_ to be nerfed into the ground and was recognized as such by Riot. He snowballs too hard when he reaches draintank status, and he tower dives way too easily.

umm... {{champion:39}}


For real though, Irelia has mobility, 75 true damage on hit, stun/slow and survivabilty and can just generally do everything aatrox can do but waay better. while Aatrox cant get a buff to his base stats?
The point im trying to make here is that there are champions like Irelia who can never get shut down but Riot wont allow Aatrox to even be kind of good? its these inconsistencies that make me wonder if Riot even know what theyre doing.

You are literally comparing apples and oranges.

Did you see the games where Aatrox could tower dive for free at lvl 3?

>survivability

Yeah she can do this better than Aatrox now, but not back in the day homie.  Read his abilities.
lol, you might not even survive a tower dive at lvl 3 with aatrox because of how squishy he is
So no you haven't seen the games.
What are you talking about? I used to main him, hes way too squishy for a supposed bruiser

You're really good at dodging the question.

I've mained characters that I was shit at too.  Fuck I've done stuff forever that I never really got good at.  Just because you "mained" something doesn't mean you are magically good at it.

Lol when did I say I was good at him? all I said was I used to main him and he is an extremely squishy champion especially for his class. that is a fact. anyone who plays him at least once will know that hes as squishy as a kalista. To answer your question no I havent. I dont see how that relates to aatrox's current state. thats like saying my dell pc was good back in 2002 so I never have to upgrade it. Stop wasting peoples time trying to start pointless arguments

> but Riot wont allow Aatrox to even be kind of good

This is what you said

> I dont see how that relates to aatrox's current state

What you are saying now.

They did allow him to be good.  And it was horrible for the game as a whole.  Maybe if you explore and think instead jumping to "lol Riot sucks amirite guys?" then you might actually realize that Aatrox needs a complete rework.
ok good job Sherlock can you get on with your life now?

Oooo the old "get a life" but with a neat and I guess more optimistic twist.  Good one!

Now the real question is if you will respond to this comment or if you will move on with your life.

Basically sustain is a kind of champion design which is kind of predestined to be unhealthy and with aatrox's kit taken to all sorts of extremes, he could be built like a bruiser who would out sustain nearly everyone.  He honestly had to be nerfed simply because he his passive and his innate life steal made him very safe when trading with opponents letting him even commit what would be suicidal dives and get off scot free.

Aatrox was also designed as a split pusher back when splitpushing was a meta similar to Tryndamere.

> [{quoted}](name=Trollmanship,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QzhETsaN,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-08-10T18:19:32.344+0000)
>
> Aatrox needs reworked, he's one of the few champions that both _deserves_ to be nerfed into the ground and was recognized as such by Riot. He snowballs too hard when he reaches draintank status, and he tower dives way too easily.

I COMPLETELY AGREEZZZ! Also his split push is really insane so much AS
Aatrox is so UP lol he wins lane but cant do shit in teamfights he gets instabursted, or if you go tank you do no damage and still get popped. He is actually useless
{{champion:3}} Is this him?
Close, but he's reddish in colour.

{{item:3634}}
how close am I?
GETTING HOTTER
Nah he is actually tanky enough to do something in a fight.
Aatrox...? You mean riven, brand and vayne buffs? Gotcha!

the last aatrox i have seen was 100 games ago and he snowballed so hard that he went the full crit build and carried. 
the last one before that (was not me) was 300 games ago, and the one before that was about 500 games ago and went pure tank xD

if he gets ahead and played right with a team that follows him up be can be deadly.  

full damage/life steal forces you to focus him in a fight with hard cc to shut him down.  now the adc and mid can come in hard to clean up with little cc to be slapped in them.
Who?

Sorry bro, but Riot have added Aatrox to their "forgotten champion list"

In the list includes:

Aatrox, Garen, Yorick, Urgot, Kalista, Nunu, Nasus

Forget about it, Riot are a bunch of clowns. They better buff 52.6% winrate Brand, or Riven, Right ???

Garen's still seems fine, Yorick & Urgot are still on the rework list, Kalista's constant nerfs were intentional if you paid attention, Nunu "could" use a rework as well, and Nasus also seems fine to me.
kalista is in a trash spot though...

kalista is not good for the game. her passive is sooooo strong that she has to play handcuffed in order to be balanced.
honestly she needs a full rekit.
{{champion:3}} This guy?

{{item:3123}} 

Give AAtroxx immunity to this and we're golden again.
It's more than just that, that's just one of his problems: WAYYYYY too much counterplay.
you mean A-Atrox?

Aatrox is still good no? I always beat everyone with aatrox lol.
then again only in normals..

> [{quoted}](name=Spiritful,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QzhETsaN,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-08-10T16:15:55.219+0000)
>
> Aatrox is still good no? I always beat everyone with aatrox lol.
> then again only in normals..

He can actually be a god in Low Elos. Got my first penta on him.
not tanky, lifestealy.
WHO'S THAT!? IS THAT A SEX CRIMINAL!?
Dude, that's another champion. Something I remembered happens to do with "Gravedigger"....
Of course not, they only know LeeSin and Riven.
